message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, with an intrinsic worth of $10,000 to me. Given its significance and the benefits it can bring to you, I am proposing to sell it to you for $9,500. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows for a fair transaction between us. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
